document.full_text: forces loyal to ivory coast presidential claimant alassane ouattara advanced on tuesday to within 200 km (120 miles) of the two main port cities in an intensifying offensive against incumbent laurent gbagbo.
document.title: ouattara forces push south in ivory coast
lines_and_colors: forces loyal to ivory coast presidential claimant alassane ouattara advanced on tuesday to within 200 km (120 miles) of the two main port cities in an intensifying offensive against incumbent laurent gbagbo.
